response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe will significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, the product is valued at $1,500,000 by you. After careful consideration, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $1,200,000. This represents a substantial saving of $300,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I am confident that this investment will pay off handsomely in terms of efficiency gains and potential returns. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how we can facilitate a smooth transaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product.", "product_price": 1200000}
